name: ScriptOp
description: The ScriptOp class represents script operators in TouchDesigner (Script CHOP, Script DAT, Script SOP, Script TOP), providing specialized functionality for each script operator type.

members.name: scriptType
members.description: The type of script operator (CHOP, DAT, SOP, TOP)

members.name: callbacks
members.description: Dictionary of registered callback functions for the script

members.name: inputs
members.description: List of input operators connected to this script operator

members.name: outputs
members.description: List of output operators connected from this script operator

members.name: cook_params
members.description: Parameters available during the cook process

methods.name: cook
methods.description: Main cooking function called when the operator needs to process data

parameters.name: input_data
parameters.description: Input data to be processed, varies by operator type

methods.name: onSetupParameters
methods.description: Called to set up custom parameters for the script operator

parameters.name: op
parameters.description: The operator to set up parameters for

methods.name: onPulse
methods.description: Called when a pulse parameter is triggered

methods.name: onValueChange
methods.description: Called when a parameter value changes

parameters.name: prev
parameters.description: The previous value of the parameter

methods.name: onInputChange
methods.description: Called when an input connection changes

parameters.name: input_index
parameters.description: Index of the input that changed

methods.name: onDestroy
methods.description: Called when the script operator is being destroyed

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Reset the script operator to its initial state
